name: MPaliens
description:
MPAliens - 2D Arena Platformer. It's a local party game with intense PVP matches, hardest COOP missions and different Bosses on different maps.



Features :
- 17 Weapons
- 6 Maps
- PvP
- COOP!
- BOSSES!
- Different platformer mechanics
- Great chiptune by RWG

Simple, understandable movement



Slide Shot



Teleport Shot



Traps and special mechanics
